fields.title: Harris 1983 Top Business Leaders Survey, study no. 831004

dsDescription.dsDescriptionValue:
This telephone survey of top business leaders in the U.S. focuses on the economy

Additional variables include future of the economy, the GNP, questions about respondents own businesses, inflation, borrowing and the trade deficit

fields.notesText: Subject: Study Level Error Note, Notes: The respondents of this Harris telephone survey were drawn from a list of chief executives and chief financial officers of the nation's 1200 largest corporations; Subject: null  Type: ODUM:ACCESS.CATEGORY  Notes: I; Subject: null  Type: ODUM:CODEBOOK.NUMBER  Notes: H-8310-04;
